title: Can’t log into Ready,  Unknown Error
content: App is in review and will be updated with new anomation and login system. Minor mistack caused by developing on the production domain logic implementing new features, authentication.

title: Can’t log into Ready,  Unknown Error
content: Intergrated google authentication so users can easyily and seculy access Ready App. App is being carfully reviewed and will be back up befor 1/27/2022. Sorry for the inconevance.

title: Pending review
content: The Ready App is pending review and has some nice animation expriments consisting of user navigation flow. We will try our best to fulfill our user experance.

title: Crash Report
content: Report crash caused by using deprecated google play services. And has been efficently solved by emplementing more up-to-date implementation. The Ready App will now be released in a few days pending review. Sorry for the inconvenience
